Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

Hope to God you see my face

You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Youngblood, say you want me
Say you want me back in your life
So I’m just a dead man crawling tonight
Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

End like it’s the last goodbye
Then one of us gets too drunk
And calls about a hundred times

And I’m just a dead man walking tonight
But you need it, yeah you need it
All of the time, yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Cause I need it, yeah I need it
All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Running away from ya

'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take

Lately our conversations
End like it’s the last goodbye

All of the time yeah, ooh ooh ooh

Give and you take

Say you want me out of your life
And I’m just a dead man walking tonight

 Remember the words you told me
You'd love me 'til the day I die?
Surrender my everything
'Cause you made me believe you’re mine

Yeah, you used to call me baby
Now you calling me by name
Takes one to know one, yeah
You beat me at my own damn game

You’re pushing and pushing
I’m pulling away, pulling away from ya
I give and I give and I give and you take
Give and you take
